channel.title: Food on Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Food on Thoughts

item.title: Food consumption by country
item.description: Output from this script provides charts of consumption of various food categories (in terms kg/person/year) by country and country groupings. The generated charts use the consumption per person though in the nu3 website that is the source of the data placed emphasis on CO2/person/year. The script extracts an html table data from a website, tidies the extracted data in R, and, then generates charts that show relationships from the data.
